title: Whisper of the Heart
alternative_title: Mimi wo Sumaseba; If You Listen Carefully; Ghibli Movie 10; 耳をすませば
description: Mimi o Sumaseba, which literally means If You Listen Closely, tells the story of Tsukishima Shizuku, a junior-high school student who is struggling to find out who she is. The movie takes you on a journey through her imagination and daily life as she makes decisions that will ultimately decide her future.
